summary: Nariko is fast and deadly. Dont let her looks deceive you. She is dangerous to your enemies. She is lightning fast and able to protect you from all opponents.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#e69138][size=6][u]Nariko[/u][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS]

[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4283/35843877425_6cec27531f_h.jpg[/img]
[color=#ffd966][size=5]Standalone Breton Female Follower[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#e06666][size=3]Nariko is a maniac. She is fast and furious as she slices and dices your enemies into a bloody salad.[/size][/color][/font][color=#e06666][size=3]
[font=Comic Sans MS]She has been alone for much of her life and has wandered around Skyrim learning the skills of swordplay.[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]She uses her ebony daggers with precision to dissect enemies[/font] at will.[/size][/color][color=#e06666]
[/color]


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#e69138][size=6][u]Stats and Perks[/u][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS]
[color=#76a5af][size=4]Class: Combat Rogue[/size][/color][color=#76a5af][size=4]
Perks: One-Handed perks and Light Foot
Armor: Simple Leather
[/size][/color][/font][color=#c27ba0][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#76a5af][size=4]Voice: Female Sultry
Weapons: Duel Ebony Daggers
Relationship Status: Single but willing to commit to right person
Location: The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun
Levels with player up to 255[/size][/color]
[/font]
[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4257/35843894885_fcd90aaea4_h.jpg[/img]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#e69138][size=6][u]Credits[/u][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy

Brows by [/size][/font][/size][/color][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][color=#c27ba0]Hvergelmir[/color][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]
[color=#c27ba0]Eyes of Beauty by LogRamm[/color]
[color=#c27ba0]Creating Standalone Followers by Natilde[/color]
[color=#c27ba0]Bethesda for Skyrim[/color][/size]
[/font]

[color=#6fa8dc][size=5]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Thanks to everyone for checking out all of my followers.[/font][/size][/color][font=Comic Sans MS]
[color=#00ffff][size=6]All comments, screenshots and videos are welcome.[/size][/color][/font][color=#00ffff][size=6]
[/size][/color]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=4]If anyone would like to make a certain body request please let me know by using the comment page or the forum messenger.


[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=3]This mod can also be used in Skyrim Special Edition.[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][/center]
[center][/center]
author: lewbob
